message:
[Asp.net](http://Asp.net) core github project.  
But, weirdly, I can no longer reproduce it on the same machine two days later.  
I created a .zip of a stock web app, modified to include just the get method.  
Failed reliably.  
Zipped it, submitted it to aspnet core folks.

They could not see it. And frustratingly neither could I.

I have to assume that it was a pilot error, or a cached copy of the assembly.

[https://github.com/aspnet/Home/issues/2874](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/issues/2874)
